methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a new FileSystemBrowserPlugin-specific action context.

params.name: provider
params.comment: the ComponentProvider that generated this context.

params.name: contextObject
params.comment:
an optional contextObject that the ComponentProvider can provide to the 
   action.
